scripts.compile: echo "┏━━ Compiling Eslint-Config" && run pre-yarn && run lint && run cleardist && run jsc && run clearmodules && echo "┗━━ Done"
scripts.lint:
echo "┣┳━ Running Lint
┃┣━ Abort 
┃┗━ No need to Lint"
scripts.cleardist:
echo "┣┳━ Running ClearDist
┃┣━ Abort 
┃┗━ There is no dist"
scripts.jsc:
echo "┣┳━ Running Javascript Compiler
┃┣━ Abort 
┃┗━ No need to Compile"
scripts.clearmodules:
echo "┣┳━ Running ClearModules
┃┠─ run rimraf ../../node_modules/@athenetz-sv/util-eslint-config" && rimraf ../../node_modules/@athenetz-sv/util-eslint-config && echo "┃┗━ Done"
scripts.pre-yarn:
echo "┣┳━ Updating Dependencies
┃┠─ run yarn dedupe" && yarn dedupe && echo "┃┗━ Done"
scripts.watch:
echo "┣┳━ Monitoring Eslint-Config
┃┣━ Abort 
┃┗━ Nothing to monitor"
scripts.dev: echo "┏━━ Running Dev" && run watch && echo "┗━━ Done"
